Posts.Content: beverlyv wrote: I found 2 lumps in my breast, my aunt has had cancer. I go in for a ultrasound and mammogram tommorrow. The doctor told me breast cancer does not cause pain, and if you have pain that is a good thing. Does anyone know if you do get pain with breast cancer. I am pretty am pretty scared. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: One little question beverlyv Member_of_the_Club

Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2009 05:04PM beverlyv wrote: I did not feel the any pain, well at least until my granddaughter stepped on my breast. That is when I found the lumps. It did not hurt when the doctor touched them today, but I feel something from then just not sure if it is because I know they are there now. Thanks for answering me.
